short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds many searching options from right-click menu

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds many easy search options to your right-click menu. Once you select text, you can right click it to search Amazon, YouTube, and more with those search terms.
